title: Updated eu (Basque) translation
body: Commit made via [Stringlate](https://lonamiwebs.github.io/stringlate/)

title: Request: clear entire history
body: It would be nice to be able to clear the full history with a single button or from settings. After doing a lot of conversions deleting them one-by-one is too time consuming.

title: Missing currencies, update API
body:
It seems that quite some currencies disappeared after the update to 1.7. Looking at 1d77ddc8, the reason is the switch to ECB's data which in turn was necessary because Yahoo discontinued its API.

There is a thread concerning this problem and one of the answers suggest using https://openexchangerates.org and others. See https://stackoverflow.com/a/38357848

How about implementing multiple providers with some sort of prioritizing (when a currency is referred in multiple sources).

Letting the user define a custom currency #7 is another approach and useful as well.

I'm using 1.6 version

title: Affix of Angle Conversions and Viscosity Conversions on Equate
body:
### Proposals

I use Equate on my smartphone. After 3 weeks using this application, I found flaws in the application. So I want to share my opinion and here are my proposals.

* Angle conversions
* Viscosity conversions

Angle conversions: there are several angle units that can be used, namely rad, deg (°), min ('), sec ("), grad and circle.

Viscosity conversions: there are several viscosity units that can be used, namely poise, centipoise, kg/m.s and lb/ft.hr.

### Benefits

Angle units and viscosity units are units that are often used, especially for students in the field of engineering like me. Angle conversions can help users to convert an angle unit into other angle units as needed. Viscosity conversions can help the user to convert a viscosity unit into other viscosity units as needed. Angle conversions and viscosity conversions can facilitate users (especially students) to convert angle units and viscosity units when completing tasks in terms of measurement, practicum and practice questions.

title: Cryptocurrency rates not working
body:
For a few days now, the cryptocurrency rates haven't been working. Any ideas why?

Actually, looking at it, I think all the rates are down.

Thanks

title: Add option for hPa and fuel weight conversions
body:
Hi,
I miss hPa unit there is only Pa and kPa and mostly pressure is given in hPa it would be more convenient to have hPa.
Also it would be nice to have fuel conversions from liters to kg and such for some types of fuel like 100LL, Jet-A.

Great app!
Thanks.

title: Request: Add decred (DCR) to cryptocurrencies
body:
Can you please add decred (symbol: DCR) to the cryptocurrencies. This blockchain has been around a long time (years) and is currently #41 on CMC.

Thanks

title: Memory Leak
body:
After a double background-foreground event of the CalcActivity there are in heap memory more instances of:

class com.llamacorp.equate.view.ConvertButton @ 0x12e4f000
class com.llamacorp.equate.view.ConvKeysFragment$2 @ 0x12dfed00
class com.llamacorp.equate.view.ConvKeysFragment @ 0x12c8d400
class com.llamacorp.equate.view.ConvKeysFragment$1 @ 0x12dfec40
class com.llamacorp.equate.view.ConvKeysFragment$3 @ 0x12dfedc0

It should not be like this because the background-foreground events return to the same GUI state and the memory should stay in the same state as well. It could be a symptom of a bad management of the onStart-onStop lifecycle. 

I have encountered this problem on an Android emulator running 7.1.1 os version.

title: Request: epoch time
body: I am not sure how to fit this in to `Equate` but I would love to see epoch/unix time added. Even if it is something as simple as epoch time to a human readable format.

title: Disable number separator
body: Is it possible to disable number separators? I prefer to see `1234567` rather than `1,234,567`.

title: Add trigonometric functions
body: Would need a nice way to add them which does not clutter the main interface. Perhaps a slide in menu like the existing main menu, but from the right instead?

title: Limit number of decimals
body:
Thanks for an excellent app! Feature request: configurable max number of decimals displayed. It's just that I rarely need many decimals in the result and would prefer that more expressions in the history view could fit on one line instead of breaking to two lines. So not only limiting the number of decimals in the results but also ensuring that the left side can expand to make use of the horizontal space freed up.

Not so important request... just a small improvement.

title: NEO still using AntShares ticker?
body: NEO crypto returning wrong value, I think probably it's still using the old AntShares symbol

title: [Feature Request] Dash price added to currencies
body:
I would love to see the price of dash added to supported currencies. I know bitcoin is already present but dash is my primary digital currency. It would be very easy to add, here is the free API to Kraken that gives the price in USD:

https://api.kraken.com/0/public/Ticker?pair=DASHUSD

(you can also get the price of dash in euros by simply changing the pair parameter to DASHEUR)

If someone can make this happen, I would be happy to tip them. Thank you.

title: [Unit Request] Add pressure unit - centimetre of water
body: Please add [cm H<sub>2</sub>O](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Centimetre_of_water) pressure unit. It used for evaluation of [central venous pressure](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Central_venous_pressure) and [lung ventilator](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Artificial_ventilation) setup. CVP is pretty easy to measure with ruler and plastic tube, filled with saline (NaCl in water), so cm H<sub>2</sub>O is used for it.

title: [Feature request] Time conversion
body: For example seconds to days.

title: Add option to manually change exchange rate or create new currencies with custom rate
body:
I exchanged money from a local money exchange shop, that doesn't apply the exchange rate found on the Internet. I would like to configure Equate to customize the exchange rate, either by customizing the exchange rate of existing units, or creating a new currency with a custom exchange rate.

The latter would probably be the best.

title: [Feature request] Display result as you type
body:
Please add an option to **evaluate the expression as you type, and always display a preview of the result** (if there are no errors).
_This feature is very easy to implement and it would increase greatly the usage of the app!_

Similar calculator that does this [PC/Windows]: [http://www.pmasoft.net/englisch/pmacalc.htm](url)

> Thank you! This is the best calculator for Android!

title: [feature request] Byte/bit conversion
body:
Megabytes to gigabytes, megabyte to megabit, etc.

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Units_of_information

title: Explicitly state GPLv2+ license
body:
You have added the genereal GPLv2 license information but don't explicitly state, if you are using GPLV2 or GPLv2+ (which means "GPLv2 or any later version"). Plain GPLv2 is considered  incompatible with Apache2 license -- which is used by android support libraries.

Could you add a small note to your readme? Thanks.

body: User requests offline mode to minimize data use/tracking
